page.title: 05RHUM PONIES
page.content:
On the island of Rhum there are 20 highland ponies.There is also a stallion called Mac.
In the winter the ponies are fed both in the morning and at night. During the summer they graze.
They are used for carrying culled deer. Several of the ponies are broken in for riding. The island children and adults are allowed to ride them. The newest foal ,Sarah, was born on 7th May 1985. The oldest pony, Mary (aged 21), gave birth to her.
Some of the ponies are sold on the mainland.
On several occasions the ponies have been used for mountain rescues.
